release.description: This release of the Registry Service is a component of the integrated release 1.0.0 of the PDS 2010 System.
release.action: Enabled HTTP PUT and DELETE actions in OpenAM Policy definitions for Web URLs.
Restricted the access only to the members of the affiliate group.

release.description: This release of the Security Service is a component of the integrated release 0.1.0 of the PDS 2010 System.
release.action: Provide the initial integration of the open source OpenAM product for satisfying the Security Service requirements.
Provide the initial configuration to utilize a separately installed OpenDS directory server.
Populated the directory server with the initial dump of PDS users from the PDS catalog.
Provide the capability to secure specific URLs for the Registry Service via its host Apache Tomcat server.
Provide the initial documentation covering the design, installation and operation of the software.
